title: Manage Raw Material Inventory and Release
description: A supply chain coordinator must manage the inventory of an active pharmaceutical ingredient (API), including receiving, testing, and release for production.

tasks.description: Log the receipt of a new shipment of API from a supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new inventory record for the API lot, including quantity and supplier details, and assigns it a 'Quarantine' status.

tasks.description: Request quality control testing for the new API lot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a sample and test request in the LIMS.

tasks.description: Receive the testing results from QC, confirming the API meets all specifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the certificate of analysis from LIMS showing passing results.

tasks.description: Change the status of the API lot from 'Quarantine' to 'Released', making it available for use in manufacturing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the inventory status.
